title: Ticket #4322: Add C like include to config files
description:
config files should support a way to declare that other files should also be parsed in much the same way that #include works for C/C++. This would be both more flexible and more powerful than the current LOCAL_CONFIG_FILE mechanism.

To minimize changes in the parser, and to follow the current metaknob convention. the syntax will be 

    include : _file_

or 

    include : _cmd_ |
